General.Name: Ningbo Zhenyu Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Ningbo Zhenyu Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells lamination dies and precision machining equipment in China and internationally. It offers precision progressive stamping dies, motor iron cores, and lithium battery precision mechanism components. The company offers dies for air conditioner compressor, refrigerator compressor, washing machine, plastic sealing, automotive, generator, stepper, induction, universal, shaded pole, and BLDC motors. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Ningbo, China.
